appVersionPrompt.title: New update available
appVersionPrompt.note:
We need a quick update to ensure the best experience.

Would you like to update now?
Make sure to save your work.

jobDescriptionReplacePrompt.content: Uploading a new job description will override the current job description.

mfaRequiredModal.heading: Enable Multi-Factor Authentication
mfaRequiredModal.description: To use this feature, please setup your MFA from your profile settings.

password.label: To continue, please enter your password.

methodSelection.heading: Select your verification method(s)
methodSelection.description: Selecting both will allow you to have a backup verification method if you are ever unable to access one. The most secure option will be selected by default.

addPhoneNumber.heading: Phone Number
addPhoneNumber.label: We’ll text a verification code to this mobile number whenever you sign in to your account.

authenticatorApp.heading: To set up your authenticator, scan the QR code into your app.

qrCode.description: If you are having trouble with the QR code, enter the code below into the app.

code.label: Please enter the code that is displayed on your Authenticator app.

authenticatorApp.description:
To use this method, you need to have authenticator app on your phone. The app will generate a verification code every time you log in for added security.

If you don’t have one already, simply visit your app store to download one. Some popular ones are:

loginCodeVerification.heading: Code Verification
loginCodeVerification.label: If you want to make changes to your MFA settings, please enter the code below.

authenticatorApp.description: Your account is now linked with your Authenticator app.

sms.phoneNumber: Your phone number is set to {{phoneNumber}}.
sms.description:
Authentication codes will be send to this number via SMS.
You can change this in your profile settings anytime.

disable.heading: You successfully disabled {{mfaMethod}} as an MFA method
disable.description: You can manage these settings from your profile.
disable.tooltip: This will disable {{mfaMethod}} as an mfa method

alerts.mfaMethodChanged: Your MFA method has successfully been changed to {{mfaMethod}}
alerts.phoneNumber: You are using a different phone number in the Multi-Factor Authentication settings. Please make sure it’s up to date.
alerts.codeClipboard: The code was copied to your clipboard

candidateExist.alert: We have this candidate in the system and the candidate you're trying to import has already applied to this job. You can always import a different candidate or submit the existing one to a different job.
